abilities.title: High-Priority Target
abilities.text: At the start of this Unit's activation, one character in this Unit may . Then, if there are one or more enemy characters within 5, this Unit may immediately makes a focus action. Always gets the job done Choose an enemy Unit within 2 and roll 3 Defense Dice. If there are any [block] results, the chosen Unit gains . If there are any [expertise] results, it gains . If there are any results, it gains [exposed]. Calculated Plans When a character in this Unit makes an attack as part of a combat action, during the Modify Dice Rolls step, this Unit may use this ability. Reroll up to two [failture] or [expertise] results in the attack roll. I engineer success, yet... It eludes me When an allied Bounty hunter character makes an attack as part of a combat action, if the target is contesting an Active objective that you do not control, this Unit may use this ability. Add 3 dice to the attack roll. If the defender is not Wounded by the attack, lose a Momentum.

abilities.title: Bounty hunter
abilities.text: When an allied  character makes an attack as part of a combat action, if the target is contesting an Active objective that you do not control, this Unit may use this ability. Add 3 dice to the attack roll. If the defender is not Wounded by the attack, lose a Momentum.
